plot: A guy who used to be a small shy boy and very bad at sports, especially swimming, over comes his weak point and becomes a great triathlete.
title: Triathlete
plot_es: A guy who used to be a small shy boy and very bad at sports, especially swimming, over comes his weak point and becomes a great triathlete.
plot_en: A guy who used to be a small shy boy and very bad at sports, especially swimming, over comes his weak point and becomes a great triathlete.
